trans-unit.source: CODESET values for import and export procedures

seg-source.mrk: CODESET values for import and export procedures

target.mrk: CODESET values for import and export procedures

trans-unit.source: Import and export procedures accept arguments to specify codeset values. You can specify the codeset (character encoding) for import and export procedures to override the system default.

seg-source.mrk: Import and export procedures accept arguments to specify codeset values.
You can specify the codeset (character encoding) for import and export procedures to override the system default.

target.mrk: Import and export procedures accept arguments to specify codeset values.
You can specify the codeset (character encoding) for import and export procedures to override the system default.

trans-unit.source: For a table that shows a sample of the character encodings supported by the Java Development Kit, see "derby.ui.codeset property" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph>. To review the complete list of character encodings, refer to your Java documentation.

seg-source.mrk: For a table that shows a sample of the character encodings supported by the Java Development Kit, see "derby.ui.codeset property" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph>.
To review the complete list of character encodings, refer to your Java documentation.

target.mrk: For a table that shows a sample of the character encodings supported by the Java Development Kit, see "derby.ui.codeset property" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph>.
To review the complete list of character encodings, refer to your Java documentation.
